org.franca.deploymodel.dsl

Class FDMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.deploymodel.dsl.FDMapper

  • public class FDMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The FDMapper provides a mapping from the elements of a Franca model (i.e., the elements in a *.fidl file) to the property definitions of a Franca deployment model. For example, if there is a property definition in some *.fdepl-file for an FMethod, the FDMapper will map this FMethod to the corresponding FDMethod object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FDMapper(FDInterface fdi)
      This constructor of FDMapper will initialize the mapper from a given deployment definition for an interface.
      FDMapper(FDTypes fdt)
      This constructor of FDMapper will initialize the mapper from a given deployment definition for some global type definitions.

    • Method Summary

      • FDMapper

        public FDMapper(FDTypes fdt)
        This constructor of FDMapper will initialize the mapper from a given deployment definition for some global type definitions.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getFDElement

        public FDElement getFDElement(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject obj)
        The actual mapping function. For an element of a Franca interface model it will provide the corresponding deployment element (if any).
        Parameters:
        obj - the element of the Franca model
        Returns:
        the actual mapping or null (if no mapping available)
